<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Dodge Away](/Feats.aspx?ID=1875) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 155 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Acrobat](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=45)

**Prerequisites**
[Acrobat Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=1873)

**Trigger**
You are the target of a melee attack.

**Requirements**
You're aware of the attack and aren't [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16).

</column>

---

You use your acrobatic prowess to evade an attack, using momentum to keep yourself moving, if you choose. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to AC against the triggering attack. If the attack misses you, you can Step after the Strike. If you're a master in [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1), you can move 10 feet on this Step instead of 5 feet.
name: Dodge Away
requirement: You're aware of the attack and aren't  flat-footed .
